UCSD subsequently received a brief notice from the DOD Department of 3 the Air Force that stated: “The Government intends to terminate this Award under the authority of 4 2 CFR 200.340(a)(4).” No explanation of any kind for the termination was provided.  5 405.  On March 3, 2025, DOD issued a Grant/Cooperative Agreement Modification. Again, it provided no explanation for the termination beyond form language: 6   The subject grant award no longer effectuates the program goals or 7  agency priorities as found in 2 CFR 200.340(a)(4) as incorporated 8  into  the  DOD  Research  and  Development  General  Terms  and 9  Conditions for grants by reference.
